descriptionHtml:
The Morgul family was once a relatively powerful family in Morrowind their roots digging deep in the Dark Brotherhood, but in 4E c.5-6 when Red Mountain erupted it eradicated much of the Morgul family spreading the survivors across Tamriel. The remaining survivors where-abouts are unknown but it's said that the deadly twins Euri and Eturi survived and are hiding in a Dark Brotherhood sanctuary. 

You can find Kalen in Windpeak Inn equiped with steel armor and a steel sword.
author: A-Poc
